comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: "Mrs. Sprague, Mrs. Stiness, and her daughter are the guests of the mother of Mrs. Stiness, Mrs. Avice Wheaton Borda, at her villa on Ocean Road, where she has been spending the summer and fall, having recently been joined there by her husband, Mr. Wenceslao Borda, of Porto Rico." books.google.com/books?id=OJkUAAAAYAAJ&lpg=PA81&o... At age 19, Inez Sprague (1889-1981), "the belle of Rhode Island," granddaughter of the former governor Sprague (also the granddaughter of Salmon P. Chase), eloped with Harry Stiness, the son of a judge. She was supposed to marry another man the next day. They had a daughter, but were divorced within a few years. news.google.com/newspapers?id=Jj0oAAAAIBAJ&sjid=KAUGA... www.sprague-database.org/genealogy/getperson.php?personID... Inez's mother was the former Avis (or Avice) Weede, married three times--the third time to Wenceslao Borda Jr., of Puerto Rico. Inez's daughter was Avice Wheaton Stiness (30 November 1908-1980).

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca--Thanks for the details--we will add more to the description when we update.
